---

```py
import requests, base64
url = 'https://dummyimage.com/600x400/000/fff'

image_bytes = base64.b64encode(requests.get(url).content)

image_bytes.decode() # or image_.decode('utf-8') 
```


# bytes example

```
b''
```

# strings example

```
''
```

 # Ref

[Way to convert image straight from URL to base64 without saving as a file in Python - Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38408253/way-to-convert-image-straight-from-url-to-base64-without-saving-as-a-file-in-pyt)
